title: Coronavirus: 'Millions' of Americans could be infected, expert warns
description: The US government's leading expert warns up to 200,000 people could die, as cases continue to rise.
content:

 Dr Anthony Fauci (L), seen here with President Donald Trump, is a leading expert in infectious diseases
